text: José Luis Caballero (21 June 1955 – 14 January 2021) was a Mexican footballer. He competed in the men's tournament at the 1976 Summer Olympics. He won a gold medal at the 1975 Pan American Games. He was born in Mexico City. Caballero died on 14 January 2021 in Mexico City, aged 65. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Mexican footballers Category:Sportspeople from Mexico City Category:Olympians for Mexico
title: José Luis Caballero
